entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the water in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 6.
